article_title: Investments in Store Remodeling Are Starting to Payoff

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: Despite continued headwinds, the company exceeded its full year guidance, which it had raised after an impressive Q3. This outperformance was primarily driven by higher front-end and pharmacy sales. While a more severe flu season worked in favor of Rite Aid, it was partially offset by the launch of new generics (which being cheaper lowered the price per prescription).
og.title: Rite Aid Q1 Sales Overview: Investments in Store Remodeling Are Starting to Payoff
